EnhanceR Symposium 2024

Research IT contribution to FAIRness

  • Home
  • Timetable
  • Registration
  • EnhanceR Seminar

Preliminary Timetable

EnhanceR Symposium 2024 will take place at the Empa-Akademie on Thursday, November 7th, 2024.

If you are registered, you will receive all news about the schedule by email.

Overview schedule
9:30–10:00 Registration / Coffee
10:00–10:15 Welcome
10:15–11:00 Keynote: Implementing the FAIR Principles: Progress and Problems (Mark Wilkinson)
11:00–11:30 Plenary: Renku 2.0: Code, data and compute in the same platform for FAIR research (Elisabet Capon + Laura Kinkead)
11:30–12:00 Teaser Talks: Short presentations of show-and-tell topics
12:00–13:00 Show-and-tell parallel sessions 1–2
13:00–14:00 Lunch
14:00–14:30 Keynote: Building FAIR research repositories in practice (Lars Holm Nielsen, virtual talk)
14:30–15:00 Plenary: Building an RSE community in the ETH domain and steps towards a Swiss wide RSE community (Tarun Chadha + Uwe Schmitt)
15:00–15:30 Plenary: Beyond FAIR data: FAIR and reproducible workflows with AiiDA, Materials Cloud and AiiDAlab (Giovanni Pizzi)
15:30–17:00 Show-and-tell parallel sessions 3–5
17:00–17:10 Farewell
Full schedule
Track A Track B Track C Track D
9:30–10:00 Registration / Coffee
10:00–10:15 Welcome
10:15–11:00 The growth of Research Software Engineering and its vital place in research (Simon Hettrick)
11:00–11:30 SWITCH Cloud – The cloud for education and research (Visho Jesudasan)
11:30–12:00 Collaborative expertise: synergies between multi-disciplinary experts and end users in software development (Aaron Ponti)
